snippet: Doug McDermott scored 29 points off the bench to lead Chicago to victory at Toronto on Monday night, with the Bulls earning their ninth straight victory over the Raptors.
abstract: NBA Roundup; Chicago Bulls defeat Toronto Rapors, 109-107; other basketball scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Doug McDermott scored 29 points off the bench to lead Chicago to victory at Toronto on Monday night, with the Bulls earning their ninth straight victory over the Raptors.
